transcript.title: PM 25/1962 - Minister-in-Charge of the C.S.I.R.O
transcript.content:
P. M, No. 25 /1962

The Prime Minister, Mr. Menzies, announcedÂ today that he has appointed Senator the HonourableÂ J. G. Gorton, Minister for the Navy, as Minister-in-ChargeÂ of the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research
Organization. Since the changes in the Ministry, late inÂ December last, the Prime Minister has, himself, beenÂ responsible for the C. S. I. R. O.

CANBERRA,
16th February, 1962.
